page.title: 16Hardy Rd. area. Our survey.
page.content: The Hardy road area is made up mostly of small bungalows. The people we interviewed liked living in the area because "it is a nice quiet and pleasant environment". One elderly lady said "I like the area because it doesn't have any{'Punk Rockers'}or vandals". Punk Rockers are young people who wear very bright clothes and often dye their hair different colours. They are sometimes very shocking to look at and old people are a little frightened by them. The old people have to walk about a quarter of a mile to get to the shops which are in the centre of Bishops Cleeve. This causes a problem for some of the people we interviwed because it meant having to cross the increasingly busy and dangerous Station road.
